results.title: Astromech.net Builders Club
results.description: Official R2-D2 Builders Club forum with CAD files, dome dimensions, and electronics discussions.

results.title: Thingiverse – Full-Scale R2-D2 Dome (Baddeley Design)
results.description: Complete printable dome assembly with opening panels and mounting guides.

results.title: YouTube – 3D Printed R2-D2 Build Log (Part 1: Dome)
results.description: Detailed step-by-step series covering the dome print, sanding, and panel fitting.

results.title: GitHub – R2-D2 Control App
results.description: Open-source Android Bluetooth control app for driving R2-D2 and managing sound/light modules.

results.title: Amazon AU – WS2812B LED Strips 5 V
results.description: Individually addressable LED strips used for R2 logic displays and PSI lights.

results.title: Bunnings – Ryobi ONE+ 18 V Battery
results.description: Compatible 18 V battery system for powering your R2 build.

results.title: YouTube – Dome Rotation & Slip Ring Wiring
results.description: Tutorial on using a 6-wire slip ring and motor to rotate the R2-D2 dome smoothly.

results.title: Thingiverse – R2-D2 Drive Base with Omniwheels
results.description: Printable drive base and wheel housing for a full-size R2-D2 build.
